text:
a while back I was comparing RMM products (and focusing on their patch
management) and CW Automate I felt was far and away the best fit for us with
flexibility, monitoring and scripting/automation. However reporting let it
down. Turns out they have another product - Brightgauge which you can use to
add extra / custom reporting. so yet another addon/cost when things like this
should be built into the core product.
We never ended up signin on the dotted line due for internal reasons but that
was where we ended up in that process.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from smalleysteve@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]
